item.title: Journal articles
item.description: Begley V, Jordán-Pla A, Peñate X, Godino-Garrido A, Challal D, Cuevas-Bermúdez A, Mitjavila A, Barucco Mara, Gutiérrez G, Singh A, Alepuz P, Navarro F, Libri D, Pérez-Ortín JE, Chávez S (2020). Xrn1 influence on gene transcription results from the combination of general effects on elongating RNA pol II and gene-specific chromatin configuration. RNA Biology. doi: 10.1080/15476286.2020.1845504.
